name: Rea Gopane
disclosureNotes: Acknowledges use of AI in this interview https://iol.co.za/entertainment/music/2026-01-16-rea-gopane-on-ai-and-creativity-as-his-music-finds-streaming-success/ "Despite online speculation that his new music is AI-generated, Gopane clarified that “AI is part of the toolkit, not the story.” “I use it as a production and creative accelerator, similar to how artists once embraced new instruments or software. The vision, direction, emotion and final decisions are entirely human,” he explained."
markerNotes: This reel https://www.tiktok.com/@gangdigitals/video/7601807955163499796 also suggests the use of AI tools.
